Body:
I am having trouble drawing a syntax tree for these sentences and I would appreciate it if someone could help me right now.

Why did Ella, one of my friends, who always comes on time to the class where we usually use to learn syntax seriously and in which we met her for the first time rent the motorcycle where horn was broken because of the accident which happened 2 weeks ago when the day was raining?

I would also be thankful if you can explain to me how to draw it, because I do not understand it very well.
Title: How to make Syntax trees for these sentences?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.
